summary: Volcanic activity frees giant scorpions from the earth who wreak havoc in the rural countryside and eventually threaten Mexico City.
cast: Richard Denning|Mara Corday|Carlos Rivas|Mario Navarro|Carlos Múzquiz|Pascual García Peña|Fanny Schiller|Pedro Galván|Arturo Martínez|Quintín Bulnes|José Chávez|Roberto Contreras|Ángel Di Stefani|Jaime González Quiñones|Leonor Gómez|Bob Johnson|Margarito Luna|Héctor Mateos|José L. Murillo|Manuel Sánchez Navarro|Isabel Vázquez 'La Chichimeca'|Enrique Zambrano
title: El escorpión negro
